name: Dungeons & Dragons Online: The Sinister Secret of Saltmarsh
summary: Sinister Secret of Saltmarsh mini-expansion was introduced in Update 50. An evil Alchemist's mansion stands alone on a cliff and mysterious lights and hauntings have kept people away despite rumors of great treasure.
